name: client_id
comment: Client ID. Your client id can be obtained by creating an app at https://builder.quantimo.do (type: string)

name: status
comment: Status. Status of Measurement Export. ex. OK or ERROR (type: string)

name: type
comment: Type. Whether user's measurement export request or app users. Individual studies are based on data of a single user. Group studies are based on data from a specific group of individuals who have joined.  Global studies are based on aggregated and anonymously shared data from all users. (type: string)

name: output_type
comment: Output Type. Output type of export file.

name: error_message
comment: Error message. Ex: reminderStartTimeLocal is less than $user->earliestReminderTime or greater than  $user->latestReminderTime (type: string)

name: created_at
comment: Time at which the Measurement Export was Created At. When the record was first created. Use UTC ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss datetime format. Time zone should be UTC and not local. (type: string)  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.

name: updated_at
comment: Time at which the Measurement Export was Updated At. When the record was last updated. Use UTC ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss datetime format. Time zone should be UTC and not local. (type: string)  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.

name: deleted_at
comment: Time at which the Measurement Export was Deleted At.  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.
